first_para: Dr. Alasdair McDonnell (born 1 September 1949) is an Irish politician who has been the Leader of the Social Democratic and Labour Party (SDLP) since 2011, and the Member of Parliament and Member of the Legislative Assembly of Northern Ireland for South Belfast since 2005 and 1998 respectively.

full.extract:
Dr. Alasdair McDonnell (born 1 September 1949) is an Irish politician who has been the Leader of the Social Democratic and Labour Party (SDLP) since 2011, and the Member of Parliament and Member of the Legislative Assembly of Northern Ireland for South Belfast since 2005 and 1998 respectively.
^ "Alasdair McDonnell elected SDLP leader". RTÉ News. 5 November 2011.
full.title: Alasdair McDonnell
